00019 #include <qvalidator.h>
00020 #include <qregexp.h>
00021 
00022 #include "journalEditCurrencyValidator.h"
00023 
00024 JournalEditCurrencyValidator::JournalEditCurrencyValidator(QObject *parent, const char *name)
00025     : QValidator(parent,name)
00026 {
00027     regexp = new QRegExp("^\\d*\\.?\\d?\\d?$");
00028 }
00029 
00030 JournalEditCurrencyValidator::~JournalEditCurrencyValidator()
00031 {
00032     delete regexp;
00033 }
00034 
00035 QValidator::State JournalEditCurrencyValidator::validate(QString &input, int&) const
00036 {
00037     if(input == "")
00038         return QValidator::Acceptable;
00039     if(regexp->search(input) == -1)
00040         return QValidator::Invalid;
00041     else
00042         return QValidator::Intermediate;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void JournalEditCurrencyValidator::fixup(QString &input) const
00046 {
00047     if(input == "")
00048         return;
00049 
00050     if(input.right(1) == ".")
00051         input.append("00");
00052     if(input.mid(input.length() - 2, 1) == ".")
00053         input.append("0");
00054     if(input.find('.') == -1)
00055     {
00056         if(input.length() == 1)
00057             input.insert(input.length() - 1, ".0");
00058         else
00059             input.insert(input.length() - 2, ".");
00060     }
00061 
00062     if(input.left(1) == ".")
00063         input.insert(0, "0");
00064 }
